title: 目测1.31连错误报告也变了一些？
author: sylqiuyifeng
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
This error has been saved to F:\Minecraft\1.3\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-08-01_22.08.39-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

新版的错误报告……我怎么弄的？
在试reis minimap时候出来的

replies.author: doudou19758
replies.txt_content: 什么啊，是正版的！你又不是正版，你怎么玩的？

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
doudou19758 发表于 2012-8-1 22:11 
什么啊，是正版的！你又不是正版，你怎么玩的？
不是正版的……
一边去……
覆盖jar会不会

replies.author: 黄凯航
replies.txt_content:
This error has been saved to F:\Minecraft\1.3\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-08-01_22.08.39-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.
这段变了，游戏设置里有个设置可以在游戏崩溃时报告给Mojang。。可能是这样的？

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
黄凯航 发表于 2012-8-1 22:13 
这段变了，游戏设置里有个设置可以在游戏崩溃时报告给Mojang。。可能是这样的？
不知道……
没见到有这设定
顺便吐槽……泥煤的minimap……我怎么搞也不行……确定能支援1.31？
